about_the_game:
Soar through the sky islands of Alioth and defeat any foe standing in your way using your piloting skills, unique abilities and powerful weapons. Airhounds is an aerial dogfighting roguelite focused on fast-paced action!

ESCAPE EXILE

Play as an immortal man banished from society who's trying to escape exile. Dying means starting over from The Anchor, where you'll board your aircraft again to bring the fight to your captors.

DISCOVER ALIOTH

The skylands of Alioth got a lot in reserve. Discover the 3 different biomes with unique foes and fight challenging bosses in order to regain your freedom.

POWER UP!

Each level you beat will give you the option to choose between various abilities such as map-wide lightning strikes, fire tornadoes and invisibility. But be careful though, as you'll lose them all upon death. However, knowledge gathered throughout each run help you become increasingly stronger with permanent upgrades you can unlock after each death.

Airhounds is still in development and many more features will be added and are subject to change, wishlist if you wish to support the project :)

name: AIRHOUNDS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
